meanings.definition: The study or practice of bell ringing.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated herself to learning campanologies at the church.
meanings.sent2: The campanologies of the cathedral bells filled the town with music.
meanings.sent3: The campanologies class was always a hit with the students.
meanings.sent4: His understanding of campanologies was as clear as the sound of a ringing bell.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of campanologies echoed through the ancient tower.

meanings.definition: The art or skill of ringing bells in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The artist's campanologies created a symphony of sound in the square.
meanings.sent2: Her precise campanologies made the bells sing harmoniously.
meanings.sent3: The campanologies competition brought out the best in the participants.
meanings.sent4: His campanologies were like a well-choreographed dance of sound.
meanings.sent5: The master's campanologies were a delight to all who listened.
